verses.verse: וַֽיִּשְׁבְּת֡וּ <S%H7673><s%> ceased שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> So these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> men הָ֭אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מֵעֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> to answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> because he [was] righteous בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> in his own eyes פ

וַיִּ֤חַר <S%H2734><s%> Then was kindled אַ֨ף ׀ <S%H639><s%> the wrath אֱלִיה֣וּא <S%H453><s%> of Elihu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּרַכְאֵ֣ל <S%H1292><s%> of Barachel הַבּוּזִי֮ <S%H940><s%> the Buzite מִמִּשְׁפַּ֪חַ֫ת <S%H4940><s%> of the kindred רָ֥ם <S%H7410><s%> of Ram בְּ֭אִיּוֹב <S%H347><s%> against Job חָרָ֣ה <S%H2734><s%> kindled אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> was his wrath עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> because צַדְּק֥וֹ <S%H6663><s%> because he justified נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> himself מֵאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> rather than God

וּבִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> Also against his three רֵעָיו֮ <S%H7453><s%> friends חָרָ֪ה <S%H2734><s%> kindled אַ֫פּ֥וֹ <S%H639><s%> was his wrath עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מָצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> because they had found מַעֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4617><s%> no answer וַ֝יַּרְשִׁ֗יעוּ <S%H7561><s%> and [yet] had condemned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִיּֽוֹב׃ <S%H347><s%> Job

וֶֽאֱלִיה֗וּ <S%H453><s%> Now Elihu חִכָּ֣ה <S%H2442><s%> had waited אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֭יּוֹב <S%H347><s%> till Job בִּדְבָרִ֑ים <S%H1697><s%> had spoken כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because זְֽקֵנִים־ <S%H2205><s%> older הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> than לְיָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> were years

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלִיה֗וּא <S%H453><s%> When Elihu כִּ֘י <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> there מַעֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4617><s%> that [there was] no answer בְּ֭פִי <S%H6310><s%> in the mouth שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> of [these] three הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> men וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> then his wrath פ

וַיַּ֤עַן ׀ <S%H6030><s%> answered אֱלִיה֖וּא <S%H453><s%> And Elihu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּֽרַכְאֵ֥ל <S%H1292><s%> of Barachel הַבּוּזִ֗י <S%H940><s%> the Buzite וַיֹּ֫אמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and said צָ֘עִ֤יר <S%H6810><s%> I am young אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> in לְ֭יָמִים <S%H3117><s%> years וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> and you יְשִׁישִׁ֑ים <S%H3453><s%> and ye [are] very old עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that זָחַ֥לְתִּי <S%H2119><s%> wherefore I was afraid וָֽאִירָ֓א ׀ <S%H3372><s%> and durst מֵחַוֹּ֖ת <S%H2331><s%> not shew דֵּעִ֣י <S%H1843><s%> you mine opinion אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> Days יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> should speak וְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> and multitude שָׁ֝נִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> of years יֹדִ֥יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> should teach חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> wisdom

אָ֭כֵן <S%H403><s%> But רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> [there is] a spirit הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he בֶאֱנ֑וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> in man וְנִשְׁמַ֖ת <S%H5397><s%> and the inspiration שַׁדַּ֣י <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty תְּבִינֵֽם׃ <S%H995><s%> giveth them understanding

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> Great men יֶחְכָּ֑מוּ <S%H2449><s%> are not [always] wise וּ֝זְקֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> neither do the aged יָבִ֥ינוּ <S%H995><s%> understand מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Therefore I said שִׁמְעָה־ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken לִּ֑י אֲחַוֶּ֖ה <S%H2331><s%> to me I also will shew דֵּעִ֣י <S%H1843><s%> mine opinion אַף־ <S%H637><s%> too אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הוֹחַ֨לְתִּי <S%H3176><s%> Behold I waited לְֽדִבְרֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1697><s%> for your words אָ֭זִין <S%H238><s%> I gave ear עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> While תְּב֥וּנֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H8394><s%> to your reasons עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> While תַּחְקְר֥וּן <S%H2713><s%> whilst ye searched out מִלִּֽין׃ <S%H4405><s%> what to say

וְעָֽדֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5704><s%> even אֶתְבּ֫וֹנָ֥ן <S%H995><s%> Yea I attended וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Indeed אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there לְאִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job מוֹכִ֑יחַ <S%H3198><s%> unto you and behold [there was] none of you that convinced עוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> [or] that answered אֲמָרָ֣יו <S%H561><s%> his words מִכֶּֽם׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תֹּ֣֭אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> Lest ye should say מָצָ֣אנוּ <S%H4672><s%> We have found out חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> God יִדְּפֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5086><s%> thrusteth him down לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> not man

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor עָרַ֣ךְ <S%H6186><s%> Now he hath not directed אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> against מִלִּ֑ין <S%H4405><s%> [his] words וּ֝בְאִמְרֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H561><s%> him with your speeches לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֲשִׁיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> against me neither will I answer

חַ֭תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> They were amazed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֣נוּ <S%H6030><s%> they answered ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer הֶעְתִּ֖יקוּ <S%H6275><s%> no more they left off מֵהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִלִּֽים׃ <S%H4405><s%> speaking

וְ֭הוֹחַלְתִּי <S%H3176><s%> When I had waited כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> (for they spake כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because עָ֝מְד֗וּ <S%H5975><s%> not but stood still לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֥נוּ <S%H6030><s%> [and] answered עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

אַעֲנֶ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> [I said] I will answer אַף־ <S%H637><s%> too אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> my חֶלְקִ֑י <S%H2506><s%> also my part אֲחַוֶּ֖ה <S%H2331><s%> I also will shew דֵעִ֣י <S%H1843><s%> mine opinion אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> For מָלֵ֣תִי <S%H4390><s%> For I am full מִלִּ֑ים <S%H4405><s%> of matter הֱ֝צִיקַ֗תְנִי <S%H6693><s%> me constraineth ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit בִּטְנִֽי׃ <S%H990><s%> within

הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בִטְנִ֗י <S%H990><s%> Behold my belly כְּיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> [is] as wine לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִפָּתֵ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> [which] hath no vent כְּאֹב֥וֹת <S%H178><s%> bottles חֲ֝דָשִׁ֗ים <S%H2319><s%> like new יִבָּקֵֽעַ׃ <S%H1234><s%> it is ready to burst

אֲדַבְּרָ֥ה <S%H1696><s%> I will speak וְיִֽרְוַֽח־ <S%H7304><s%> that I may be refreshed לִ֑י אֶפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> I will open שְׂפָתַ֣י <S%H8193><s%> my lips וְאֶֽעֱנֶֽה׃ <S%H6030><s%> and answer

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> to no נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now אֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> Let me not I pray you accept פְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> person אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any man's וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> unto man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֲכַנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3655><s%> neither let me give flattering titles

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> For I know אֲכַנֶּ֑ה <S%H3655><s%> not to give flattering titles כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> would soon יִשָּׂאֵ֥נִי <S%H5375><s%> take me away עֹשֵֽׂנִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> [in so doing] my maker
